archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.3a: a) employing up-to-date makes/models of hardware which are easily maintained (i.e. rather than using obsolete, legacy or unsupported products) and can meet the requirements of the critical business processes they support
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
